trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="app-service" ms.workload="web" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="06/30/2015" ms.author="omark"/>

trans-unit.source: What is Azure App Service?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure App Service?

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service is the only cloud service that integrates everything you need to quickly and easily build web and mobile apps for any platform and any device.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service is the only cloud service that integrates everything you need to quickly and easily build web and mobile apps for any platform and any device.

trans-unit.source: Built for developers, App Service is a fully managed platform with powerful capabilities such as built-in DevOps, continuous integration with Visual Studio Online and GitHub, staging and production support, and automatic patching.
trans-unit.target: Built for developers, App Service is a fully managed platform with powerful capabilities such as built-in DevOps, continuous integration with Visual Studio Online and GitHub, staging and production support, and automatic patching.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service is a single service that includes all of the existing capabilities from Azure Websites, Azure Mobile Services, and Azure Biztalk Services, while adding new capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service is a single service that includes all of the existing capabilities from Azure Websites, Azure Mobile Services, and Azure Biztalk Services, while adding new capabilities.

trans-unit.source: Learn more
trans-unit.target: Learn more

trans-unit.source: about how App Service relates to these existing services.
trans-unit.target: about how App Service relates to these existing services.

trans-unit.source: Why App Service?
trans-unit.target: Why App Service?

trans-unit.source: Focused on rapid development of web and mobile apps, as well as automating business processes, Azure App Service provides an integrated set of enterprise capabilities through a single development and management experience offering you the following benefits:
trans-unit.target: Focused on rapid development of web and mobile apps, as well as automating business processes, Azure App Service provides an integrated set of enterprise capabilities through a single development and management experience offering you the following benefits:

trans-unit.source: Build Web and Mobile Apps Fast
trans-unit.target: Build Web and Mobile Apps Fast

trans-unit.source: - Rapidly build, deploy and manage web and mobile apps for employees or customers using a single back-end.
trans-unit.target: - Rapidly build, deploy and manage web and mobile apps for employees or customers using a single back-end.

trans-unit.source: Use your existing languages skills -- .NET, Java, NodeJS, PHP, or Python.
trans-unit.target: Use your existing languages skills -- .NET, Java, NodeJS, PHP, or Python.

trans-unit.source: Accelerate development with access to a rich gallery of APIs, connectors, and logic available in the Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: Accelerate development with access to a rich gallery of APIs, connectors, and logic available in the Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: Connect to any service and unlock your data
trans-unit.target: Connect to any service and unlock your data

trans-unit.source: - Connect your web or mobile app to enterprise systems or SaaS in minutes with built-in connectors.
trans-unit.target: - Connect your web or mobile app to enterprise systems or SaaS in minutes with built-in connectors.

trans-unit.source: Choose from more than 50 connectors for enterprise systems such as SAP, Siebel, and Oracle to popular enterprise SaaS services like Salesforce and Office 365 to popular internet services such as Facebook, Twitter and Dropbox.
trans-unit.target: Choose from more than 50 connectors for enterprise systems such as SAP, Siebel, and Oracle to popular enterprise SaaS services like Salesforce and Office 365 to popular internet services such as Facebook, Twitter and Dropbox.

trans-unit.source: Integration made simple
trans-unit.target: Integration made simple

trans-unit.source: - Integrate data across clouds and automate business processes in minutes with a simple visual design experience.
trans-unit.target: - Integrate data across clouds and automate business processes in minutes with a simple visual design experience.

trans-unit.source: Easily integrate your logic it with any mobile or web app via standard REST APIs.
trans-unit.target: Easily integrate your logic it with any mobile or web app via standard REST APIs.

trans-unit.source: Build sophisticated enterprise application integration, B2B solutions using EDI, business policies (rules engine), and more based on the industry leading BizTalk platform.
trans-unit.target: Build sophisticated enterprise application integration, B2B solutions using EDI, business policies (rules engine), and more based on the industry leading BizTalk platform.

trans-unit.source: Unparalleled developer productivity
trans-unit.target: Unparalleled developer productivity

trans-unit.source: - Optimized for DevOps, with continuous integration support for Visual Studio Online and Github, so you can focus on rapidly improving your apps without worrying about infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: - Optimized for DevOps, with continuous integration support for Visual Studio Online and Github, so you can focus on rapidly improving your apps without worrying about infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Deploy app updates with built-in staging, roll-back and in-production testing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Deploy app updates with built-in staging, roll-back and in-production testing capabilities.

trans-unit.source: Enterprise Ready
trans-unit.target: Enterprise Ready

trans-unit.source: - Enjoy peace of mind with enterprise grade security and management.
trans-unit.target: - Enjoy peace of mind with enterprise grade security and management.

trans-unit.source: Provide delegated and role-based administration; easily secure and manage data flowing to your mobile apps; and protect your assets with built-in backup and restore capability.
trans-unit.target: Provide delegated and role-based administration; easily secure and manage data flowing to your mobile apps; and protect your assets with built-in backup and restore capability.

trans-unit.source: Rest confidently knowing App Service is PCI compliant.
trans-unit.target: Rest confidently knowing App Service is PCI compliant.

trans-unit.source: Stay in control with dedicated environments, and the ability to deploy across public and private clouds.
trans-unit.target: Stay in control with dedicated environments, and the ability to deploy across public and private clouds.

trans-unit.source: Benefit from over 25 years of Microsoft experience and our enterprise Service Level Agreement.
trans-unit.target: Benefit from over 25 years of Microsoft experience and our enterprise Service Level Agreement.

trans-unit.source: App Service Concepts
trans-unit.target: App Service Concepts

trans-unit.source: The following high-level concepts describe what you can do with App Service.
trans-unit.target: The following high-level concepts describe what you can do with App Service.

trans-unit.source: App Types
trans-unit.target: App Types

trans-unit.source: App Service allows you to create the following app types from a single development experience:
trans-unit.target: App Service allows you to create the following app types from a single development experience:

trans-unit.source: **Web Apps**
trans-unit.target: **Web Apps**

trans-unit.source: - Quickly create and deploy mission critical Web apps that scale with your business.
trans-unit.target: - Quickly create and deploy mission critical Web apps that scale with your business.

trans-unit.source: **Mobile Apps**
trans-unit.target: **Mobile Apps**

trans-unit.source: - Engage employees, partners and customers on any device at any time.
trans-unit.target: - Engage employees, partners and customers on any device at any time.

trans-unit.source: **API Apps**
trans-unit.target: **API Apps**

trans-unit.source: - Easily build and consume Cloud APIs and participate in the API economy.
trans-unit.target: - Easily build and consume Cloud APIs and participate in the API economy.

trans-unit.source: **Logic Apps**
trans-unit.target: **Logic Apps**

trans-unit.source: - Automate the access and use of data across clouds without writing code.
trans-unit.target: - Automate the access and use of data across clouds without writing code.

trans-unit.source: As a single integrated service, App Service makes its easy to compose the above app types into a single solution, allowing you to easily build apps that target both web and mobile clients using the same back-end and integrate with on-premise systems as well as popular services such as Office 365 and salesforce.com.
trans-unit.target: As a single integrated service, App Service makes its easy to compose the above app types into a single solution, allowing you to easily build apps that target both web and mobile clients using the same back-end and integrate with on-premise systems as well as popular services such as Office 365 and salesforce.com.

trans-unit.source: App Service Plans
trans-unit.target: App Service Plans

trans-unit.source: App Service Plans represent a set of features and capacity that you can share across your apps.
trans-unit.target: App Service Plans represent a set of features and capacity that you can share across your apps.

trans-unit.source: App Service Plans support a few pricing tiers (e.g. Free, Shared, Basic, and Standard) where each tier has its own capabilities.
trans-unit.target: App Service Plans support a few pricing tiers (e.g. Free, Shared, Basic, and Standard) where each tier has its own capabilities.

trans-unit.source: You can quickly change which App Service Plan an app is hosted on with no downtime.
trans-unit.target: You can quickly change which App Service Plan an app is hosted on with no downtime.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about App Service Plans
trans-unit.target: Learn more about App Service Plans

trans-unit.source: Get Started with App Service
trans-unit.target: Get Started with App Service

trans-unit.source: Want a taste?
trans-unit.target: Want a taste?

trans-unit.source: Get going in seconds.
trans-unit.target: Get going in seconds.

trans-unit.source: With Azure App Service, this is as easy as selecting a language!
trans-unit.target: With Azure App Service, this is as easy as selecting a language!

trans-unit.source: Create a new web app
trans-unit.target: Create a new web app

trans-unit.source: right away for free.
trans-unit.target: right away for free.

trans-unit.source: No credit card required, no commitments, no hassles.
trans-unit.target: No credit card required, no commitments, no hassles.
